name: 封仙(Age of Immortals)
description:
[Intro]
Ascension, the latest MMORPG, has come onto smart devices!
Leave your own mark on this spectacular universe with swords and romance!
Fiery battlefields, guild wars, territory battles, solo and team duels…various PvP combat modes await you!
Set off on a journey to otherworldly realms with unrestricted flight, full access to rare items, and exquisite attires!

[Features]
1. Unrestricted Freedom
This unique feature gives players a chance to obtain all items and equipment via defeating mobs in/outside dungeons. You don’t have to be a big spender to dominate the battlefield.

2. Various PvP Modes
Sharpen your blade and ready your skills before you confront formidable opponents in the Arena, Guild War, 1v1 Combat, Faction Battlefield, and more upcoming PvP modes.

3. Upgrade’em All
Players may obtain upgrade items via defeating mobs in the solo dungeons and on the world map. Use these items to upgrade your glamorous mounts, glaives, relics, and wings.

4. Auto Combat Support
You can use this feature to help you complete Main Quests, Side Quests, Daily Quests, and Bounty Quests in a breeze. No worries in keeping up with your friends and foes.

[Contact Us]
If you like our game, please don't forget to leave some comments.
Age of Immortals Fanpage: https://www.facebook.com/ujoysword
